Wanita Ini Hadiahi Suami Mobil Mewah dari Hasil Jualan Ayam Potong
05 Nov 2019, 08:04 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Dari hasil jualan ayam potong di pasar, wanita ini mampu berikan hadiah mobil mewah untuk sang suami. Kisahnya pun viral di internet.Jualan ayam potong, mungkin terlihat seperti salah satu pekerjaan yang kurang bergengsi. Padahal, jika ditekuni dengan serius usaha ayam potong ini bisa menjadi pundi-pundi yang menjanjikan. Hal ini lah yang diterapkan oleh pasangan suami istri dari Tanah Merah, Kelantan, Malaysia.Baca Juga: Sedih Banget! 600 Potong Ayam Goreng Untuk Pesta Kelulusan Hilang Dicuri


Foto: Istimewa

Dikabarkan Mothership (04/11), Lan dan sang istri Nur Amyza Ismail, merupakan pemilik dari Berkat Ilahi. Bisnis yang menjual daging ayam potong yang masih segar. Mereka merintis bisnis ayam potong ini dari tahun 2008, dan dari tahap nol.Tapi dalam waktu 11 tahun, Amyza mampu mengumpulkan uang dan memberikan mobil mewah baru jenis Audi A3 seharga RM 240,170 (Rp 811,230,765), untuk sang suami, Lan.Lewat unggahan di Facebook milik Lan, kisah pasangan penjual ayam potong ini jadi viral. Di sana mereka menceritakan, bahwa mereka berasal dari kampung, dan tidak memiliki pendidikan tinggi. Saat merintis, mereka hanya punya satu toko ayam potong saja.


Foto: Istimewa

Tak jarang, banyak orang yang mengejek mereka, karena mereka berasal dari kampung dan hanya menjadi penjual ayam potong."Kita tidak pernah menaruh dendam pada orang-orang yang mengejek kita. Melainkan kita mengambil komentar negatif itu, sebagai motivasi untuk terus berjuang," tulis Lan.Berkat kerja keras pasangan suami istri ini, mereka sudah memiliki 4 toko ayam potong yang terkenal di Tanah Merah. Mobil mewah yang dibelikan sang istri, juga merupakan pencapaian mereka dari hasil kerja keras jualan ayam.Meski sudah menjadi orang sukses, tapi Lan dan Amyza tetap hidup sederhana. Mereka tetap menjual ayam potong dengan harga murah, kisaran RM 3.99 (Rp 13,473). Sebagai bentuk terima kasih kepada para pelanggannya, karena selalu membeli daging ayam di toko mereka.


Foto: Istimewa

"Saya bangga melihatnya, sukses hasil kerja keras dan keringat sendiri. Saya doakan semoga Pak Lan semakin murah rezeki, Amin." doa seorang netizen.Hingga kini unggahan Lan di Facebook sudah dibagikan 3,8 ribu kali dan mendapatkan 921 komentar.Baca Juga: Wow! Sehari Kedai Ayam Goreng di Korsel Bisa Jual 52.000 Potong Ayam Simak Video "Ayam Goreng Serundeng Beraroma Nan Gurih"[Gambas:Video 20detik](sob/odi)

This Woman Reward Husband Luxury Cars from Selling Chicken Pieces
05 Nov 2019, 08:04 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Photo: Special

Jakarta - From the sale of cut chicken in the market, this woman is able to give a luxury car gift to her husband. The story was viral on the internet. Selling chicken pieces, might look like one of the less prestigious jobs. In fact, if taken seriously this chicken business can be a promising coffers. This is what is applied by a married couple from Tanah Merah, Kelantan, Malaysia. Also Read: So Sad! 600 Pieces of Fried Chicken For Graduation Party Lost Stolen


Photo: Special

Reportedly Mothership (04/11), Lan and his wife Nur Amyza Ismail, are the owners of the Divine Blessing. A business that sells freshly cut chicken meat. They pioneered this chicken business from 2008, and from zero. But in 11 years, Amyza was able to raise money and provide a new luxury car type of Audi A3 for MYR 240,170 (IDR 811,230,765), for her husband, Lan. Through uploads at Facebook's Lan, the story of the couple selling chicken pieces became viral. There they told me, that they came from the village, and did not have higher education. When pioneering, they only have one chicken shop only.


Photo: Special

Not infrequently, many people mock them, because they come from the village and only become sellers of broilers. "We never hold grudges against those who mock us. Instead we take that negative comment, as motivation to keep fighting," wrote Lan. Thanks to the hard work of this husband and wife, they already have 4 famous chicken shop in Tanah Merah. The luxury car that his wife bought, was also their achievement from the hard work of selling chickens. Although they had become successful people, but Lan and Amyza kept their lives simple. They still sell chicken at low prices, around RM 3.99 (Rp 13,473). As a form of thanks to its customers, for always buying chicken meat in their shop.


Photo: Special

"I am proud to see it, the success of the work of hard work and sweat myself. I pray that Mr. Lan is getting cheaper, Amin." prayer of a netizen. Until now Lan's upload on Facebook has been shared 3.8 thousand times and get 921 comments. Also Read: Wow!
